## Description {#details}

Function in this group pertain to <a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> instances that descent from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">llvm::User</a>.

This includes constants, instructions, and operators.
